channel.title: S3 on devopstales
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on devopstales

item.title: Backup your Kubernetes Cluster with Velero
item.description: Velero (formerly Heptio Ark) gives you tools to back up and restore your Kubernetes cluster resources and persistent volumes. You can run Velero with a cloud provider or on-premises.

item.title: Export GCP VM to S3
item.description: Step by step guide to export virtual machine running in Google cloud computer engine to your S3 bucket.

item.title: Install s3cmd with CEHP Radosgateway
item.description: s3cmd is a cli utility for s3.

item.title: Install CEHP Radosgateway on Proxmox
item.description: RADOS Gateway is an object storage interface in Ceph. It provides interfaces compatible with OpenStack Swift and Amazon S3.
